revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WMP-N12 |revision= |upc=886227881161 |ean= |asin= |price=50 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/12/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=audio streamer |fcc_id=MSQ-WMPR300 |ic_id=3568A-WMPR300 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=Audio in/out (3.5mm, RCA, optical) |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS_WMPN12 |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N300 Audio Streamer}} :[https://www.asus.com/supportonly/WMP-N12/HelpDesk_Download/ Support page]
[[ASUS WMP-N12]] FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-WMPR300 MSQ-WMPR300] :[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2776363 Users manual] Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2776361 FCC label].
===Features=== * Extends wireless home networking * Streaming music with ASUS AiPlayer app or AirPlay * One-press setup and worry-free connectivity * Full coverage with internal MIMO antennas
===Specifications=== *Name: ASUS WMP-N12 Wireless Audio Streamer *Product Name: ASUS SonicStream *Category: Media Bridge; MP Date: *Product Segment: 802.11b/g/n 2T2R :N300: 300Mbps (2.4GHz, 20/40MHz) *Chipset/WiFi: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N :Data Rate: 802.11n (up to 300Mbps) :Wireless encryption: Open System/WPA/WPA2 *Memory: Flash: 8MB, RAM: 16MB *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antennas *Ports: 1x FE LAN (RJ45) 10/100 BaseT :2x Audio (3.5mm), 2x RCA, 1x Optical *Audio Processor: C-Media 6510B *Audio Input: WiFi / AUX In *Audio Output: 3.5mm Phone jack/Stereo RCA/Optical (SPDI/F) *Operational Amplifier: TI Burr-Brown OPA-1602 *Stereo DAC Sample Rates: 8K/11.025K/16K/22.05K/32K/44.1K/ :48K/88.2K/96K (Bit rate: 16/24bits) *SPDI/F Sample Rates: 44.1K/48K/88.2K/96K (Bit rate: 16/24bits) *Audio Signal to noise ratio: up to 100dB :Frequency response: 10Hz to 48KHz :Headphone impedance: 32 ohm :THD + N: up to 0.002% @1KHz *Support format: .mp3 .wav .flac *Software Application: ASUS AiPlayer (iOS / Android) *Button: Volume switch / Reset *LED: System LED / Volume LED *Power Supply: USB adapter (input 5V/1A) :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) 0.2A :DC Output : 5V with max 1A current *Size: 110x75x22 mm
===See also=== * [[ASUS RP-N12]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN12/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product Page]
__NOTOC__
